Change log
==========

## [2.0.2] - 2015-05-27

### Fixed

- [#16] incompatible with psr/http-message current version

## [2.0.1] - 2015-03-27

### Added

- Added Vagrant file to setup and configure nodes

### Fixed

- Small issue with the CurlDriver


## [2.0.0] - 2015-03-22

Initial release of 2.x

### Added

- Message
- Streamable
- Request
- Response
- Command

### Changed

- Complete Rewrite of Library

### Deprecated

- 1.x Releases
